summary: Tested three bug fixes: 1) Download button visibility on public gallery, 2) Password Settings in Edit modal, 3) Coordinator Name field. Found and fixed a backend bug where coordinator_name was not being returned in GET /api/galleries/{id} response.
critical_code_review_comments: FIXED: GET /api/galleries/{id} was missing coordinator_name in response - added line 4161 in server.py

success_rate.frontend: 100% - All UI flows verified via Playwright

seed_data_creation: Set test password on gallery during testing (may need manual removal)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Gallery 'THE WEDDING OF DENHAR AND YASMEN' (ID: 5e2a7d5d-ffe1-4d4f-8982-60b7ce1d3132, share_link: 465f44a9) now has a gallery access password set from testing. The password is 'TEST_password_123'. All three bug fixes verified working.

bug1_download_button_visibility.details: Download button shows on public gallery when photos.length > 0, regardless of download password setting

bug1_download_no_password.details: Clicking Download without password fetches download info directly and shows dropdown

bug2_password_settings_section.details: Edit Gallery modal has 'Password Settings' section with both password fields

bug2_gallery_access_password.details: Gallery Access Password field can be edited and saved

bug2_download_password.details: Download Password field can be edited and saved

bug3_coordinator_name.details: Coordinator Name field is present in edit modal and can be edited

bug3_coordinator_name_persistence.details: Coordinator name changes persist after save (fixed backend bug)

coordinator_name_not_returned.description: GET /api/galleries/{id} endpoint was not returning coordinator_name field
coordinator_name_not_returned.root_cause: Missing coordinator_name=gallery.get('coordinator_name') in the Gallery response construction at line 4152-4178
coordinator_name_not_returned.verification: Tested via API - coordinator_name now returned correctly after update
